snippet: A rare Tyrannosaurus Rex skeleton, to be a centerpiece of a future exhibition at the Smithsonian’s National Museum of Natural History, will have to remain hidden a little longer.
abstract: A rare Tyrannosaurus Rex skeleton, to be a centerpiece of a future exhibition at the Smithsonian’s National Museum of Natural History, will have to remain hidden a little longer.

headline.main: Government Shutdown Changes  a T. Rex's Travel Plans
headline.print_headline: T. Rex a Casualty Of Government Shutdown

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Smithsonian National Museum of Natural History
